parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description: This historical parameter does not take effect and is not required.

parameters.name: NewResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of new resource group. You can obtain the ID on the Resource Group page in the Resource Management console. For more information, see [View basic information about a resource group](~~151181~~).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the Data Transmission Service (DTS) instance resides.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: This parameter is only for special services and not required.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the DTS instance. You can view the ID in the **ID/Name** column on the task page in the console.

>  This parameter is required.

parameters.name: ZeroEtlJob
parameters.description: This parameter is only for special services and not required.
